wizard.title: AnimaWorks Setup
wizard.subtitle: Digital Anima Framework - Initial Setup
lang.title: Select Your Language
lang.desc: Choose the display language for the setup wizard and UI.
lang.label: Display Language
lang.preview.title: Preview
lang.preview.text: The setup will proceed in this language. AnimaWorks is a framework that treats AI agents as autonomous "animas". Each Anima has their own identity, memory, and decision-making criteria, and acts autonomously.
env.title: Environment Setup
env.desc: Detect your runtime environment and configure API keys.
env.provider.title: LLM Provider
env.provider.claude_code.desc: Via Claude Code CLI. No API key needed
env.provider.ollama.desc: Local models. No API key needed
env.imagegen.title: Image Generation APIs (Optional)
env.imagegen.desc: Used for character image generation. You can configure these later.
leader.title: Create Leader
leader.desc: Choose a name for your first digital anima (the organization's leader).
leader.label: Name (alphabetic)
leader.hint: Only alphabetic characters are allowed. Will be converted to lowercase.
leader.error: Please enter a name using only alphabetic characters
userinfo.title: Tell Us About Yourself
userinfo.desc: Enter your information so Animas can recognize you.
userinfo.name: Username
userinfo.name.hint: Alphanumeric characters and underscores only. Will be converted to lowercase.
userinfo.bio.placeholder: Tell us about yourself â€” hobbies, work, interests...
userinfo.error: Please enter a username using only alphanumeric characters or underscores
confirm.title: Review Your Settings
confirm.desc: Setup will be completed with the following settings.
